metadata.Title: CVE-2019-15166 on Ubuntu 14.04 ESM (trusty) - medium
metadata.Description:
lmp_print_data_link_subobjs() in print-lmp.c in tcpdump before 4.9.3 lackscertain bounds checks.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2019-15166` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

tcpdump - 4.9.3-0ubuntu0.14.04.1+esm1
Available with Ubuntu Pro (Infra-only): https://ubuntu.com/pro

criterions.comment: tcpdump package in trusty/esm was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '4.9.3-0ubuntu0.14.04.1+esm1').
